name: Jazenga Glide
short_description:
The goal of this project is to create a development environment which features a fully integrated translation support framework.
This framework is based on the principles of Peter Dunne of Jazenga Research Ltd., which allows for the reuse of translated keywords and phrases via a centrally managed translation memory system.
The project aims to modify the entire LCL at low level to include natural language support structures which are then inherited by all LCL components, thus realizing an IDE in which all forms are naturally multi-lingual.
This of course will be further supported by string translation tools and central resource management.
This strategy will reduce the time and cost of translation of projects while putting tools in the hands of end users which allow them to crowd source translations in a manner never before available
summary: A polylingual IDE based on Lazarus
